column5: Was out on Upper Buckhorn for a few hours on Saturday night. Caught 3 walleye. 2 were about 8" long so it was great to see the lake producing. The other was about 2lbs. All were thrown back. Black twister tail caught them all.
Awesome! I love a black twister tail grub! There is not much that won't bite one.
Never know what to use. Black, white, chartreuse or smoke. Glad u did well.
All black everything hahaha. 75% of my tackle is black or has black on it.

You would recommend black grubs for walleye at night?  I thought you would go brighter colours at night? I just started walleye fishing this opener and had a lot of success on 3" gulp grubs in chartreuse.
